head.title: Python document merging API | merge PDF, Word, Excel
head.description: Python API for document merging. Easily merge, split, swap, reorder, and remove pages from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, XPS, and EPUB files.

header.description: A powerful API for merging, splitting, and modifying PDF and Office files.

actions.title: Ready to get started?
actions.description: Test GroupDocs.Merger for free or get a license.
